co.janicek.core.html.HtmlColorCore

type
class
Color functions.

Static Variables

public MAX_COLOR_COMPONENT(inline,null) : Int

Static Methods

public inline colorFraction( fraction : Float ) : Int

Convert a fraction (0.0 - 1.0) to a color value (0 - 0xff).

public inline getBlueComponent( c : Int ) : Int

Get blue component of Int color.

public inline getGreenComponent( c : Int ) : Int

Get green component of Int color.

public inline getRedComponent( c : Int ) : Int

Get red component of Int color.

public hsl( hue : Int, saturation : Float, lightness : Float ) : String

parameters
hue A degree on the color wheel (from 0 to 360) - 0 (or 360) is red, 120 is green, 240 is blue.
saturation A percentage value; 0.0 means a shade of gray and 1.0 is the full color.
lightness Lightness is also a percentage; 0.0 is black, 1.0 is white.
returns
HTML color string.
Make HTML hsl(h,s,l) color string.

public hsla( hue : Int, saturation : Float, lightness : Float, alpha : Float ) : String

parameters
hue A degree on the color wheel (from 0 to 360) - 0 (or 360) is red, 120 is green, 240 is blue.
saturation A percentage value; 0.0 means a shade of gray and 1.0 is the full color.
lightness Lightness is also a percentage; 0.0 is black, 1.0 is white.
alpha Number between 0.0 (fully transparent) and 1.0 (fully opaque).
returns
HTML color string.
Make HTML hsla(h,s,l,a) color string.

public intToHexColor( color : Int ) : String

parameters
color Int color value.
returns
HTML color string.
Make HTML hex color string from Int value. Example: 0 -> #000000

public interpolateColor( color0 : Int, color1 : Int, f : Float ) : Int

authors
Amit Patel
Interpolate color between color0 and color1 using fraction f. When f==0, result is color0. When f==1, result is color1.

public rgb( red : Int, green : Int, blue : Int ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0 - 0xff).
green Green channel (0 - 0xff).
blue Blue channel (0 - 0xff).
Make HTML rgb(r,g,b,a) color string.

public rgbF( red : Float, green : Float, blue : Float ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0.0 - 1.0).
green Green channel (0.0 - 1.0).
blue Blue channel (0.0 - 1.0).
Make HTML rgb(r,g,b) color string using fractions.

public rgba( red : Int, green : Int, blue : Int, alpha : Float ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0 - 0xff).
green Green channel (0 - 0xff).
blue Blue channel (0 - 0xff).
alpha Alpha channel (0.0 - 1.0).
Make HTML rgba(r,g,b,a) color string.

public rgbaF( red : Float, green : Float, blue : Float, alpha : Float ) : String

parameters
red Red channel (0.0 - 1.0).
green Green channel (0.0 - 1.0).
blue Blue channel (0.0 - 1.0).
alpha Alpha channel (0.0 - 1.0).
Make HTML rgba(r,g,b,a) color string using fractions.
